title: Doctors' Bill of Rights Act of 1999
content: Prohibits HCFA from implementing any new evaluation and management (EM) guidelines under Medicare unless it has: (1) provided for an assessment of the proposed guidelines by physicians. (2) established a plan that contains specific goals for improving participation of physicians. (3) carried out a minimum of four described pilot projects in at least four different HCFA regions to test such guidelines. And (4) found that specified objectives for EM guidelines will be met in the implementation of such guidelines. Requires each pilot project to study the effect of EM guidelines on physician practices and patient and physician satisfaction.
